title: website: provide an api / directory listing for available go binary downloads
body:
I'm planning on writing a tool which will automate setting up go development environments using a specific version of go.

I'd like to be able to list available go downloads in some way that's better than parsing this page: https://golang.org/dl/

Unfortunately, directory listing is turned off for https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/ or I would just use that.
